header_text: During a meeting, your boss calls on you to write a few notes on the board. As you write down what they say, you hope you are not misspelling any words. Everyone watching you probably thinks you are doing great.

elements.Text: Do your coworkers judge you negatively while you write on the board?

elements.name: During a meeting, your boss calls on you to write a few notes on the board. As you write down what they say, you hope you are not misspelling any words. Everyone watching you probably thinks you are doing great. _Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
